transArray.content: The hotel has a cute food delivery robot that allows you to get takeaways without going downstairs. It is very safe during the epidemic. The hotel's epidemic prevention measures are in place. The room is very comfortable and the pillows and quilts are very comfortable to sleep on. The room space is also very large. Very satisfied in all aspects

Dear guests, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel, we will continue to do our best to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel, look forward to visiting again, and wish you a pleasant journey!
